name: Signature_Design_by_Ashley_Honnally_Floral_Accent_Chair
reviews: Easy to assemble. Light and easy to move around. Works perfect.
Great quality and looks even better in person
The chair looks like in the picture, but the quality is not there.
This was easy to assemble, even though the description stated it was assembled. It is a little low to the floor but provides good, comfortable seating when extra company comes over.
Very comfortable. I ordered two and am not disappointed.
Very nice quality for the price. The fabric wrinkles a little in the seat but can be smothed out.
Bought this for my daughter's new apartment and it goes perfectly with the decor and with a sofa I'd purchased.
description: Signature Design by Ashley approved this chair's frame construction has been rigorously tested to simulate the home and transportation environments for improved durability. The corners are glued, blocked and stapled for increased durability. All fabrics are pre-approved for wearability and durability against AHFA standards. The cushion cores are constructed of low melt fiber wrapped over high quality for fire safety.
